programme.title: Flashs
programme.desc: Seven year-old Judith has been kidnapped. Mathilde heads the investigation with her new team. When the prime suspect is arrested, Mathilde is flabbergasted: it's none other than her mother, to whom she hasn't spoken in months. programme.title: Il Etait Une Fois... Ces Droles D'objets - EP 42
programme.desc: Watches, speakers, toilets... Maestro takes a fascinating look at some of our most everyday objects, both old and new. How exactly to they work? What is their history?

programme.title: L'agence Galactique - EP 18
programme.desc: Specialist in every type of breakdown, Agence Galactique travels the galaxy to assist its customers. Aboard their spaceship Toaster, Dany Oven, Apple and Zed work wherever they're needed sorting out inhabitants' problems in their own inimitable way: happy, cheerful and totally eccentric.

programme.title: L'imagier Anime De Koumi - EP 17
programme.desc: At 6 years old the cheerful mischievous Koumi dreams of knowing all the animals in the world. Thanks to her picture book, she's able to head off and meet them.

programme.title: Taffy - EP 48
programme.desc: Wealthy Mrs. Muchmore lives in a manor with her beloved dog Bentley. One day, Scraggs the raccoon turns up disguised as a cat. Immediately adopted by the old lady, he becomes Taffy and laps up her attention. But Bentley is not fooled and decides to chase him off his territory.

programme.title: Kididoc - EP 27
programme.desc: Kidi, a kind-hearted artificial intelligence, guides Pomme and Fix on their journey through Kidi-World. From dinosaurs to the Chateau de Versailles, the human body to the history of aviation: Kidi-World is not only an adventure-filled wonderland but also, and above all, a means of finding the answer to every question.

programme.title: Kididoc - EP 28
programme.desc: Kidi, a kind-hearted artificial intelligence, guides Pomme and Fix on their journey through Kidi-World. From dinosaurs to the Chateau de Versailles, the human body to the history of aviation: Kidi-World is not only an adventure-filled wonderland but also, and above all, a means of finding the answer to every question.

programme.title: Nubu Et Yara - EP 19
programme.desc: Young Nubu is a little boy who's curious about everything but makes one blunder after another as he learns about life. Fortunately his wiser more responsible older sister, Yara, always has the time to explain things, offering the perfect opportunity for Nubu to dive into his own comic book world.

programme.title: 1001 Moyen-Ages - EP 19
programme.desc: Braillard, Colombe and Lablatte have discovered a way to travel through time and ancient civilisations. They journey back in time to the Middle Ages, in search of answers. How did people live in those days? How did they heal themselves? How did they see that justice was done?

programme.title: Dessine-Moi Les Etoiles - EP 2
programme.desc: Science explained by cartoon artist Fiami, through questions asked by two children. Further explanations from a philosopher and an astronomer help popularize science and envision it as a great human adventure.

programme.title: Quasimodo - EP 13
programme.desc: Paris, 1483. 16-year-old Quasimodo is a hunchbacked orphan. One day, the gypsy Esmeralda, with whom he is in love, finds herself in trouble. He sacrifices himself to save her and ends up in prison. And so begins a long series of adventures...

programme.title: Pfffirates - EP 5
programme.desc: On the island of Calypso, Captain Lamar is busy training his crews in the art of pfffiracy. Between lessons in navigation, treasure hunts and boarding other ships, it's a busy programme for everyone. But it'll take more than that to deflate Pat, Lily and Stede: the threesome feel invincible!

programme.title: Football - Ligue 1 Mcdonald's
programme.desc: A match from the French football championship.

programme.title: Football - Ligue 1 Mcdonald's
programme.desc: A match from the French football championship.

programme.title: Destination Francophonie - EP 6
programme.desc: Since Brexit, France and Ireland have been developing tourism trade along the Norman Way. Ivan Kabacoff cycles along this Norman Way in Ireland, from Cork, the rebel, to Wexford, where he discovers the historical heritage founded 850 years ago.

programme.title: A Bon Entendeur
programme.desc: ''ABE'' examines a wide range of topics affecting everyday life in everyday homes: it tests products, compares prices, highlights fraudulent practices, raises consumer awareness and questions manufacturers. The programme addresses economic, social, environmental and health issues and talks about leisure activities, technology...

programme.title: Basik
programme.desc: The programme which explores and explains the economy, examines our relationship to money and analyses our purchasing power. The economic, social and environmental challenges of tomorrow are covered in a direct, down-to-earth and occasionally mischievous manner!

programme.title: Le Grand Jt Des Territoires
programme.desc: Up-to-date news from the French regions presented by Cyril Viguier.

programme.title: Le Journal De Radio-Canada
programme.desc: The televised news programme from the Radio-Canada team.

programme.title: Vivement Dimanche
programme.desc: On his iconic red sofa, Michel Drucker welcomes and shines the spotlight on the talent of yesterday, today and tomorrow. A main guest talks about their career, their projects and their origins...

programme.title: Vendee Globe 2024
programme.desc: Daily summary of the 10th Vendee Globe, non-stop solo sailing race around the world with no assistance. The skippers cover around 45,000 km crossing the world, passing the Cape of Good Hope, Cape Leeuwin and Cape Horn. Arrival and departure: Les Sables d'Olonne.

programme.title: Echappees Belles - EP 29
programme.desc: Nestling between Pyrenees-Atlantiques, Haute-Garonne and Spain, the department of the Hautes-Pyrenees offers nature at its most breathtaking. Mountains, forests, valleys, plains and a warm welcome from its locals combine in an invitation to recharge the batteries and escape the everyday, ensuring that a simple visit becomes a true break...

programme.title: Questions Pour Un Champion
programme.desc: A general knowledge quiz.

programme.title: 20h30 Le Dimanche
programme.desc: Film, music, sport, literature, politics... Laurent Delahousse's guests talk about themselves and their lives, their careers and their projects, and discuss the news making the headlines of the day. The programme closes with a live musical performance.

programme.title: Partir Autrement Entre Amis - EP 2
programme.desc: Long term friends with a veritable passion for travel, Annie Brocoli and Joel Legendre unpack their bags in Guadeloupe, or more precisely in Deshaies, on the island of Basse-Terre, where some unusual age-old activities await them.

programme.title: Un Dimanche A La Campagne - EP 7
programme.desc: A weekend together, far from the hustle and bustle of everyday life. A moment out of time to get to know one another, talk of love, friendship, life. In a house open to surprises and the unexpected, between emotion and laughter, each reveals the invisible thread of their personal story...

programme.title: Tendance XXI - EP 23
programme.desc: Elegant lines and high quality materials: Caran d'Ache is a benchmark when it comes to drawing and writing. Did you know that muslin takes its name from an Iraqi city? At Longwy, skilled craftsmen showcase the beauty of enamel. How to wear a leather coat.

programme.title: Les Chevaliers Blancs
programme.desc: Jacques, an NGO president, convinces 300 French families hoping to adopt a child to finance a plan to rescue war orphans. He has one month to get the children out. To succeed, he conceals his true plans and convinces the African authorities that he is looking to open an orphanage.

programme.title: Sweet Sugar Candyman
programme.desc: In a model of the 1900 Paris Exposition Universelle, a totally crazy Dragibus makes life impossible for his fellow sweets. His aim: to destroy the Eiffel Tower.

programme.title: 13 Novembre 2015, Anatomie D'une Instruction
programme.desc: The day after the Paris terrorist attacks on 13 November 2015, saw the launch of an exceptional judicial investigation covering some ten European countries and the USA. A collaboration that changed western counter-terrorism forever. Failures and successes: a look back at the V13 investigation and the fight against Daesh.

programme.title: Femmes De L'art - EP 7
programme.desc: In the 18th century few women were able to join the Royal Academy of Painting and Sculpture, and work for Europe's most important royalty. With her character of tempered steel and her talent, she became her Marie-Antoinette's official portrait painter.

How has it imposed itself, in just three generations, at the risk of losing in flavour and authenticity? Investigation.

programme.title: Quand Les Bourgeois Font Leur Cinema
programme.desc: Has French cinema become middle-class? In the beginning it was considered an art for the people, its films politically-committed, their message one of protest. What happened? We look back at the history of the film industry in France. With personal views and accounts by Jan Kounen, Thierry Fremeaux, Henri-Jean Servat...

programme.title: Waouh ! - EP 5
programme.desc: Nathalie Simon travels the French regions to meet extreme sports enthusiasts. Land, water, air: no matter their preferred playground, they share their passion and favourite places. They also offer a unique way to explore an area of the country. From high-level athletes to adrenaline junkies, there's emotion and excitement a-plenty!

programme.title: Un Si Grand Soleil
programme.desc: The Bastide, Estrela, Salama, Levy, Berville and Alami families, plus a host of supporting characters, live and work in the modern everyday city of Montpellier, in southern France. Between romance and crime thriller, with a blend of comic and serious themes, their stories weave a fascinating web.

programme.title: Compagnons D'arbres - EP 10
programme.desc: Injuries and fatigue are quickly forgotten, replaced by an overwhelming feeling of pride. Beyond each person's own thoughts and conclusions, the adventure has created durable links between everyone, a veritable fellowship of the trees...

programme.title: Les 33 Contours De La Chanson Romande - EP 1
programme.desc: From 1932 to 1979, Jean Villard (known as Gilles) to Patrick Juvet, ''Dollar'' to ''I Love America'', popular music in French-Speaking Switzerland tackled a wide range of themes such as ecology, nuclear power, racism, feminism... Henri Des, Michel Buhler, Yvette Theraulaz, Pascal Auberson and others recount...

programme.title: Le 6h00 Info
programme.desc: The 6am news bulletin (Paris time) by the France Televisions editorial team.

programme.title: Telematin
programme.desc: The latest news and laughter, 7 days a week With Flavie Flament and Julien Arnaud on weekdays, Maya Lauque and Damien Thevenot at weekends.

programme.title: Telematin
programme.desc: The latest news and laughter, 7 days a week With Flavie Flament and Julien Arnaud on weekdays, Maya Lauque and Damien Thevenot at weekends.

programme.title: Willy Vient Dejeuner Chez Vous - EP 6
programme.desc: Willy and Fabien head to the banks of the Meuse to meet Maxime, manager of a convivial and festive riverside ''guinguette''.

programme.title: Slam
programme.desc: Three contestants compete in a game of arrow crosswords, trying to complete the grids by finding the answers to the definitions provided. But to have access to those definitions, they first need to answer questions that all share one common characteristic: the response is always a letter.

programme.title: Le Journal De Radio-Canada
programme.desc: The televised news programme from the Radio-Canada team.

programme.title: Compagnons D'arbres - EP 10
programme.desc: Injuries and fatigue are quickly forgotten, replaced by an overwhelming feeling of pride. Beyond each person's own thoughts and conclusions, the adventure has created durable links between everyone, a veritable fellowship of the trees...

programme.title: Waouh ! - EP 5
programme.desc: Nathalie Simon travels the French regions to meet extreme sports enthusiasts. Land, water, air: no matter their preferred playground, they share their passion and favourite places. They also offer a unique way to explore an area of the country. From high-level athletes to adrenaline junkies, there's emotion and excitement a-plenty!

programme.title: Pompon Ours - EP 27
programme.desc: Seven year-old Pompon is a little bear cub. He might be mischievous but he has a precious talent that delights his best friend Rita and his parents: he can take something ordinary and make it amazing. Thanks to his extraordinary imagination, growing up from day to day becomes child's play.

programme.title: Pompon Ours - EP 28
programme.desc: Seven year-old Pompon is a little bear cub. He might be mischievous but he has a precious talent that delights his best friend Rita and his parents: he can take something ordinary and make it amazing. Thanks to his extraordinary imagination, growing up from day to day becomes child's play.

programme.title: Koka Kitoumbou - EP 9
programme.desc: Malisha, age 10, accompanied by Rikitou, her little woollen doll, heads off for fabulous adventures in search of the Koka Kitoumbou stone. No ordinary stone, it has magical properties and amazing powers, notably that of turning whatever it touches into sweet treats.

programme.title: Toc Toc ! - EP 11
programme.desc: Whenever an animal is stressed or bothered about something, they head straight to see Claude the bull. Well-known as a doctor for minor ills, he is particularly skilled in soothing everyday troubles and resolving misunderstandings. With Claude's help, the animals learn to love themselves as they are: imperfect.

programme.title: Les Mutants - EP 10
programme.desc: Realising the end of their clandestine lifestyle is near, Lila decides to live dangerously. She sets a trap for Stef, sent by Laurence to fetch her. Meanwhile, Tom has a terrible first day at Notre-Dame thanks to Laurence...

programme.title: Vendee Globe 2024
programme.desc: Daily summary of the 10th Vendee Globe, non-stop solo sailing race around the world with no assistance. The skippers cover around 45,000 km crossing the world, passing the Cape of Good Hope, Cape Leeuwin and Cape Horn. Arrival and departure: Les Sables d'Olonne.

programme.title: Willy Vient Dejeuner Chez Vous - EP 6
programme.desc: Willy and Fabien head to the banks of the Meuse to meet Maxime, manager of a convivial and festive riverside ''guinguette''.

programme.title: Un Si Grand Soleil
programme.desc: The Bastide, Estrela, Salama, Levy, Berville and Alami families, plus a host of supporting characters, live and work in the modern everyday city of Montpellier, in southern France. Between romance and crime thriller, with a blend of comic and serious themes, their stories weave a fascinating web.

programme.title: Questions Pour Un Champion
programme.desc: A general knowledge quiz.

programme.title: Familles De Legende - EP 10
programme.desc: From the worlds of craft, music, luxury goods or cookery, families whose names are familiar to most of us, whether directly or indirectly. From sagas that have already run for generations to the much more recent, all share a common desire: that of passing on their heritage.

programme.title: TV5 Monde, Le Journal
programme.desc: All the national and international news from the TV5MONDE news staff.

programme.title: Des Racines Et Des Ailes - EP 3
programme.desc: Whether summer or winter, Savoie is always a land of excellence. We meet Fombonne-Rouvier, town planner; Rene and Maxime Meilleur, chefs at a three Michelin-starred restaurant; Klebert Silvestre, bee-keeper, Nicolas Mathieu, crozet-producer and mountain guide; Pascale Vidonne, in charge of heritage in Bourg-Saint-Maurice, notably responsible for its Baroque chapels.

programme.title: Foot! (1/2)
programme.desc: Match summaries, commentary and analyses, after each day of the Ligue 1 McDonald's, the French football championship.

programme.title: Foot! (2/2)
programme.desc: Match summaries, commentary and analyses, after each day of the Ligue 1 McDonald's, the French football championship.

programme.title: Arsenault Et Fils
programme.desc: The Arsenaults, a tight-knit family enjoying the spoils of illegal hunting, have called the shots in the small village of Bas-du-Fleuve, Quebec for several generations. The return of Anthony, the impulsive youngster of the family, then the arrival of radio presenter emilie, will put the clan's relations to the test.

programme.title: FS MMA Dan Evensen vs. Jeremiah Constant
programme.desc: BodogFIGHT features classic MMA matches involving some of your favorite fighters! Dan Evensen fights Jeremiah 'Hacksaw' Constant. Constant is a game opponent and looks to make his mark against Evenson in Costa Rica.

programme.title: WCCB Jaron Ennis vs. Roiman Villa
programme.desc: From Atlantic City, undefeated rising star Jaron 'Boots' Ennis will defend his Interim IBF Welterweight World Championship against the biggest puncher he has faced so far in his career, Roiman Villa. Ennis is a fixture on many lists of the future superstars of the sport, expected to be one of boxing's best fighters. He will need to get passed Villa, who has 24 knockouts in his 27 professional fights. It's Ennis vs. Villa, on FIGHT SPORTS.

programme.title: Wide World of Fights Floyd Mayweather, Jr. vs. Shane Mosley
programme.desc: This episode features Floyd Mayweather, Jr. taking on Shane Mosley in a welterweight title bout, as well as kickboxing, sumo and more!

programme.title: Judo for the World
programme.desc: Judo for the World features the best competitors in the sport as they compete in a global tour for an opportunity to vie for the gold in the World Judo Championship. In this episode we see the best of the Hohhot Grand Prix, and stop to get to know the world's #1 ranked fighter Aleksandar Kukolj. We then head to Russia to witness the effect that Judo has on the Russian people.

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! James Kirkland vs. Eromosele Albert
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is the 21-0 James Kirkland facing off with the 21-1 Eromosele Albert. Just a little over a minute into this bout, following a combination of punches, the bout comes to a close.

programme.title: FS Grand Sumo
programme.desc: For the first time the top ranked sumo competitors in the world are featured in an action packed series, FIGHT SPORTS GRAND SUMO. This new format presents Sumo in an authentic, in-depth and entertaining way covering the rules, ranks, match-ups, and more. Show 4 featuring Ikioi, Tamawashi, Takakeisho, and Yoshikaze from the Nagoya basho, 2018.

programme.desc: Episode 9: Netanya, Israel - Hosts Jimmy Smith and Doug Anderson learn the Fight Discipline of Krav Maga with Masters Ran Nakash and Avivit Oftek Cohen.

programme.title: MEGA Fights In 60 Andre Berto vs. Victor Ortiz
programme.desc: MEGA Fights are premiere events from the sport of boxing including HBO World Championship Boxing and historic PPV events plus past, current and future World Champions. This episode features The Ring Magazine's 2011 Fight of The Year from the Foxwoods Resort in Mashantucket, Connecticut, USA. Undefeated welterweight world champion Andre Berto (27-0, 21 KOs) puts his title on the line against 'Vicious' Victor Ortiz (28-2, 22 KOs) in a fight that restores your passion in the sport of boxing.

programme.title: MEGA Fights In 60 Chad Dawson vs. Antonio Tarver II
programme.desc: MEGA Fights are premiere events from the sport of boxing including HBO World Championship Boxing and historic PPV events plus past, current and future World Champions. This episode features Light Heavyweight 'Bad' Chad Dawson (27-0, 17 KOs) vs. Antonio 'Magic Man' Tarver (27-5, 19 KOs). Held at the Hard Rock Hotel and Casino, Las Vegas, Nevada, USA on May 9, 2009, it's Dawson's first defense of the IBF Light Heavyweight and IBO Light Heavyweight titles.

programme.title: Karate 1 Premier League
programme.desc: Dublin, Ireland welcomes one of the most anticipated events in Martial Arts this year as the Karate 1 Premier League returns. This will be the first Karate 1 Premier League event to take place in Dublin, with many of the top competitors in the world making the journey to Ireland for the first time and where the new Grand Winners will be crowned.

programme.title: Wide World of Fights Floyd Mayweather Jr vs. Oscar De La Hoya
programme.desc: This episode features the WBC World super welterweight title between Floyd Mayweather, Jr. and Oscar De La Hoya that made $165 million in total gross revenue, making it the richest fight ever, as well as kickboxing, sumo and more!

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Carlos Baldomir vs. Vernon Forrest
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is Carlos Baldomir and Vernon Forrest facing off to determine the new WBC super welterweight world champion, a fight that earns both fighters an ovation at the end.

programme.title: FS Grand Sumo
programme.desc: For the first time the top ranked sumo competitors in the world are featured in an action packed series, FIGHT SPORTS GRAND SUMO. Show 5 featuring Mitakeumi, Takakeisho, Goeido and Asanoyama from the Nagoya basho, 2018.

programme.title: American Ninja Warrior
programme.desc: 100 finalists from across the country congregate on the Las Vegas strip for the American Ninja Warrior finals. This course consists of four stages to test the contestants' strength, speed and agility. In front of the finish line stands the massive metal monster, Mount Midoriyama with its daunting 77-foot Rope Climb. Can any of the contestants complete the challenges presented by The World's Most Difficult Obstacle Course? Part 3 of 5

This episode features Super Middleweights Edison Miranda (26-2, 23 KOs) vs. Willie 'The Gladiator' Gibbs (20-1, 16 KOs) from the Miccosukee Indian Gaming Resort in Miami, Florida, USA. Bonus coverage includes Jason Litzau, aka 'The American Boy' (20-1, 18 KOs) vs. Jose Hernandez (21-3, 13 KOs).

programme.title: Greatest Classics Courage Tshabalala vs. Darroll Wilson
programme.desc: FIGHT SPORTS presents another exciting Greatest Classics episode, bringing you more action featuring the greatest fighters in boxing history. From the famed Blue Horizon in Philadelphia, one of the greatest venues for boxing in the world, two heavyweight prospects square off as Courage Tshabalala of South Africa takes on Virginia native Darroll Wilson.

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Manny Pacquiao vs. Oscar De La Hoya
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is "The Dream Match" of Manny Pacquiao vs. Oscar De La Hoya that raked in $70 million in Pay-per-view revenue and launched Pacquiao into global stardom. Also on the card, action from a young Saul (Canelo) Alvarez.

programme.title: FS Grand Sumo
programme.desc: For the first time the top ranked sumo competitors in the world are featured in an action packed series, FIGHT SPORTS GRAND SUMO. This new format presents Sumo in an authentic, in-depth and entertaining way covering the rules, ranks, match-ups, and more. Show 1 featuring Tochinoshin, Daieisho, Ichinojo and Kotoshogiku from the Natsu basho, 2018.

programme.title: Karate 1 Premier League
programme.desc: Dublin, Ireland welcomes one of the most anticipated events in Martial Arts this year as the Karate 1 Premier League returns. This will be the first Karate 1 Premier League event to take place in Dublin, with many of the top competitors in the world making the journey to Ireland for the first time and where the new Grand Winners will be crowned.

programme.title: Wide World of Fights Paul Williams vs. Sergio Martinez
programme.desc: Wide World Of Fights includes all styles of fighting from around the world in one show! This episode features the first encounter between Paul Williams and Sergio Martinez, one that ends in a controversial majority decision, as well as kickboxing, sumo and more!

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants S1 - EP 3

programme.title: Old People's Home For Teenagers S2 - EP 2
programme.desc: Week 2 is all about Brainpower, with a range of brain boosting activities designed to strengthen the mind and encourage the participants to learn from one another.

programme.title: Wing Threads
programme.desc: A journey around Australia on the smallest of wings. Zoologist turned pilot, Amellia Formby, is on a mission to share her love for migratory shorebirds.

programme.title: Alone Australia S1 - EP 7
programme.desc: Food is becoming a critical issue for all participants. Approaching two weeks in the wilderness, most have not caught anything to eat, and desperation is growing.

programme.title: National Press Club Address (2024) - EP 9
programme.desc: Wally Lewis, rugby league legend and Dementia Australia Ambassador, talks about his experiences of living with probable chronic traumatic encephalopathy and his hopes for what federal funding could achieve for the community.

programme.title: Landline (2024) - EP 38
programme.desc: A tasty sampler of stories from the land - covering food, agriculture, crops, climate, business and innovation - as we meet the fascinating people who make our rural and regional communities unique. Presented by Pip Courtney.

programme.title: Meet The Neighbours S1 - EP 1
programme.desc: Around 1 in 6 people living in regional Australia have experienced discrimination. This episode will follow Maryborough's newest residents into finding jobs, housing, settling into school and the local community.

programme.title: The Cook Up With Adam Liaw Bitesize S1 - EP 8
programme.desc: Chef Adam Liaw prepares Gobi Manchurian. 'Manchurian' is a sub-cuisine of Indian food that brings local flavours to Chinese styles of cooking. Gobi (cauliflower) florets are deep-fried and then wok-tossed in a spicy sauce.

programme.title: Weekend Breakfast (2024) - EP 45
programme.desc: Ease into your Sunday with an engaging mix of news, updated information, analysis, interviews, politics and weather. Presented by Johanna Nicholson and Fauziah Ibrahim, plus sport with Jared Coote.

programme.title: Weekend Breakfast (2024) - EP 45
programme.desc: Ease into your Sunday with an engaging mix of news, updated information, analysis, interviews, politics and weather. Presented by Fauziah Ibrahim and Kathryn Robinson, plus sport with Jared Coote.

programme.title: Insiders (2024) - EP 40
programme.desc: David Speers is in Washington DC with all the washup after the US Election. A panel of commentators and experts look at the results, what it means for America's future and relations with Australia and the world.

programme.title: Offsiders (2024) - EP 40
programme.desc: Kelli Underwood and the panel cover the week in sport including Australia v Pakistan in Men's One Day Cricket, who will open for Australia in the 1st Test v India, the WBBL, AFLW Finals, A-Leagues and Spring Racing Carnival.

programme.title: That Pacific Sports Show S4 - EP 37
programme.desc: Sera Naiqama is back in the studio with double trouble, Sam Wykes and Tinirau Arona. Fellow Fijian Miliakere Koyamainavure joins the crew again to discuss 3x3 basketball. We also catch up with the Samoa Triathlon team.

programme.title: The Pacific (2024) - EP 20
programme.desc: Johnson Raela and Alice Lolohea bring you the latest in news, politics, sports and culture from across the Pacific. Featuring on-the-ground reporting about emerging and major news that matter to the region. (Season Final)

programme.title: Australian Story (2024) - EP 27
programme.desc: A mysterious email. Shocking revelations. And the ultimate betrayal. How teacher Hannah Grundy was forced to become her own detective to unmask a sick cyber criminal whose identity she couldn't believe.

programme.title: The Cook Up With Adam Liaw Bitesize S1 - EP 2
programme.desc: Chef Adam Liaw cooks a bacon and egg salad, that somewhat resembles a Caesar salad, plus his tips on how to boil eggs.

programme.title: Alone Australia S1 - EP 7
programme.desc: Food is becoming a critical issue for all participants. Approaching two weeks in the wilderness, most have not caught anything to eat, and desperation is growing.

programme.title: AFLW (2024) Hawthorn v Brisbane Lions - EP 49
programme.desc: 18 teams take part in the 2024 AFLW Season as Australia's leading women's footballers play in 11 home and away rounds plus four weeks of finals to decide the AFLW Premiership.

programme.title: AFLW (2024) Port Adelaide v Richmond - EP 50
programme.desc: 18 teams take part in the 2024 AFLW Season as Australia's leading women's footballers play in 11 home and away rounds plus four weeks of finals to decide the AFLW Premiership.

programme.title: Landline (2024) - EP 39
programme.desc: Hosted by award-winning journalist Pip Courtney, Landline is Australia's only national agricultural television program covering stories from Australia's rural and regional heartland.

programme.title: Back Roads S10 - EP 22
programme.desc: Back Roads travels to Charlton in north-west Victoria, for an event like no other. A festival that brings locals and blow-ins together, creating lasting friendships, in one big weekend of live music and country hospitality.

programme.title: Compass S37 - EP 7
programme.desc: The decision to donate organs from a loved one presents families with one of life's most difficult moments. Compass meets the recipients, donor families, nurses and doctors as they confront these complex questions.

programme.title: ABC National News (2024) - EP 315
programme.desc: There's never been a more important time for transparency and trust. ABC News brings you the latest news and today's top stories, with more reporters in more places to tell you what's going on. Presented by Meredith Sheehan.

programme.title: Field To Feast S1 - EP 7
programme.desc: Thanh unearths some of the secrets behind this emerging vegetable that is very popular internationally. Thanh then enjoys a traditional home-cooked, African dish that features Okra as the star.

programme.title: The Cook Up With Adam Liaw Bitesize S1 - EP 3
programme.desc: Chef Adam Liaw prepares pouding chomeur, which translates as 'unemployed person's pudding', and originated during the Depression.

programme.title: The Season S1 - EP 3
programme.desc: The harvest is coming to an end and everyone is getting ready to go home. As Mama Sue helps the workers pack, she is sad to see them leave. Jojo returns to Vanuatu with a new plan, while Steve gets an unexpected surprise.

programme.title: Meet The Neighbours S1 - EP 1

programme.title: First On The Ground
programme.desc: Australian peacekeepers have been in the field every year since 1947, when they were the first on the ground in the Netherlands East Indies. They serve with the aim of contributing to lasting peace around the world.

programme.title: The Art of Remembrance
programme.desc: Nate Byrne explores the role of paintings and sketches that represent the experiences of our service personnel and how visual art can help us to learn more about Australia's military history.

programme.title: The Art Of Motherhood S1 - EP 11
programme.desc: Namila explores how art can help us understand motherhood. Featuring artist Atong Atem, writer and podcaster Elizabeth Day, Kelly-Dawn Hellmrich of Camp Cope, Mother of the House Of Alexander Ella Ganza and Prof. Mary Beard.

programme.title: Framed S1 - EP 3
programme.desc: This is the Australian Cultural Terrorists. Remember us?. A phone call from the Picasso thieves promises to change everything. With so much at stake, can they be believed?

programme.title: The Tonight Show Starring Jimmy Fallon 2024
programme.desc: Emmy Award- and Grammy Award-winning comedian Jimmy Fallon brings a high-tempo energy to the storied NBC franchise with his welcoming interview style, love of audience participation, spot-on impersonations and innovative sketches . programme.title: Millennial Money
programme.desc: Putting the "personal" in personal finance, get an inside look at the lives and finances of millennials. See exactly how much they earn, what they spend it on and how they invest. From starting a business to changing careers, getting in and out of debt, creating an unusual income stream, or casting it all aside to start over again... young people reveal the steps they took to make it happen.

Sustainable Future - EP 22
programme.desc: Sustainable Future is CNBC's umbrella franchise to house explorations and discussions on the most important issue of our time; sustainability. programme.title: American Greed S1-15
programme.desc: "American Greed" goes inside the dark side of the American Dream - where money seduces, power corrupts, and smooth criminals will stop at nothing to get rich. Their complex scams leave victim's lives in shambles. Each episode is a deep dive into the minds and actions of heartless crooks who live lives most people can only dream of.

programme.title: Pga Tour 2024
programme.desc: Golfing highlights from last weekend's PGA TOUR tournament.

programme.title: Rolex Spirit Of Yachting 2024
programme.desc: Filmed at some of the most idyllic waterside locations, The Spirit of Yachting XXIII series tells the stories behind the races and reveals the passion, emotion and dedication needed to take part in the worlds premier yachting competitions. The seven shows follow the sports greatest regattas through the eyes of all those involved. Featuring the worlds greatest professional sailors and the most committed amateurs at the most desirable sailing locations across the planet.

programme.title: Ride Fei Originals 2024/25
programme.desc: Ride, an FEI Originals series takes a deeper look into the equestrian world and focuses on lifestyle, horse culture and the fascinating bond between humans and horses both inside and outside the arena.

programme.desc: Can Anduril Reboot the US Defense Industry? Emily Chang meets Anduril founder Palmer Luckey for a closer look at his defence tech startup's autonomous fleet and software operations.

programme.title: The Circuit S2 - EP 2
programme.desc: Emily Chang travels to Latin America to visit one of Netflix's most ambitious productions and get a closer look at its global strategy.

programme.title: The Circuit S2 - EP 3
programme.desc: GM's Risky Bet on the Future of Electric Vehicles. Emily Chang meets GM CEO Mary Barra for a look at her ambitious plan to transform the veteran automaker into a fast-moving tech company.

programme.title: An Optimist's Guide to the Planet S1 - EP 1
programme.desc: How do you tell dusk from dawn in the age of climate change? Host Nikolaj Coster-Waldau begins his global journey to find out.

programme.title: An Optimist's Guide to the Planet S1 - EP 2
programme.desc: Shelter is one of humanity's most basic needs. As the global population grows, how can we rethink the way we live to build a more sustainable tomorrow?

programme.title: Bloomberg Surveillance Radio
programme.desc: The economy and the markets are "under surveillance" as we cover the latest in finance, economics and investment. Join Tom Keene, Paul Sweeney, Lisa Mateo, Michael Barr and other guests.

programme.title: The Future with Hannah Fry S2 - EP 1
programme.desc: Artificial intelligence has begun to exhibit early signs of agency. Are we on a path to superintelligence? Self destruction? Or is the potential promise and threat of AI being overblown?

programme.title: The Future with Hannah Fry S2 - EP 2
programme.desc: Bioacoustics technology and AI are revealing how animals communicate, and may soon allow us to talk to them ourselves. What can we learn from wildlife? And should we be talking to the animals at all?

programme.title: The Future with Hannah Fry S2 - EP 3
programme.desc: Mathematician and Author Hannah Fry explores the powerful new technologies set to shape society, and whether that future is one that we want. Our future doesn't just happen, we make it.

programme.title: The Future with Hannah Fry S2 - EP 4
programme.desc: Water. Our survival depends on water, yet global reserves are rapidly shrinking. Can technology help secure humanity's future water needs?

programme.title: The Future with Hannah Fry S2 - EP 5
programme.desc: For some, pain is excruciating and inescapable. But amid the continuing fallout of the opioid crisis, new technologies are being developed to limit and even eliminate pain.

programme.title: The Future with Hannah Fry S2 - EP 6
programme.desc: Soon, another billion people will be online. How will these new users embrace this technology to transform their lives, and what will it mean for the rest of the world?

programme.title: The Growing Toll of America's Booming Kratom Industry
programme.desc: In this Bloomberg Originals documentary, we reveal how the unregulated substance is being promoted and even made more potent, and how some users are ending up dead.

programme.title: How India's Narendra Modi Took Power
programme.desc: Narendra Modi, India's prime minister, is both highly popular and deeply polarizing. How did he get to the top of Indian politics, and what do his policies mean for the country's future?

programme.title: Bloomberg BusinessWeek
programme.desc: Carol Massar and Tim Stenovec bring together the latest news from the world of business and finance by harnessing the power of Bloomberg Businessweek reporters and editors.

programme.title: The Deal
programme.desc: Alex Rodriguez and Jason Kelly talk with former WNBA player Candace Parker about the explosion of women's basketball, why she teamed up with Adidas and her partnership with Marc Lasry.

programme.title: The Deal
programme.desc: Alex Rodriguez and Jason Kelly sit with tennis champions Billie Jean King and Ilana Kloss to discuss the current buzz around women's sports and hear how they helped grow professional women's hockey.

programme.title: The Deal
programme.desc: Alex Rodriguez and Jason Kelly talk with David Rubenstein, co-founder of The Carlyle Group, about his recent purchase of the Baltimore Orioles and what the team means for the city.

programme.title: Momentum

programme.title: K9 Mounties
programme.desc: When the Royal Canadian Mountain Police Force are in search of a missing person they call in the help of an elite group. The K9 Mounties are rigorously trained to be able to locate those in need in the hardest to reach places. Watch as some of Canada's finest police officers are pushed to the limit in a gruelling 17 week training programme at the PCMP's Police Dog Service Training Centre in Canada.

programme.title: Johnny Kingdom's Wild Countryside
programme.desc: In this series Johnny Kingdom takes us through the enormously varied landscape and wildlife of Exmoor, one of the UK's most glorious national parks.

programme.title: Reality Trip
programme.desc: Follow five young adults as they leave their comfortable lifestyles behind to go on the Reality Trip of a lifetime! Travelling to Sri Lanka, Bangladesh and the Phillippines, the group learn the origins of their favourite brands. From working in cotton fields under a blazing sun, to sleeping on cardboard beds alongside the factory workers; this is a world they were not prepared for. Sparks fly between the group as stress and emotions take over.

programme.title: The World From Above S2
programme.desc: The second series of The World from Above flies across some of the most beautiful and dramatic places in the world. In this series, we float over Venice, find four US presidents carved into the rock at Mount Rushmore, circle over twenty chateaux in the Loire Valley and fly up the Danube to find an enormous temple dedicated to Valhalla.

programme.title: Hopeful Earth
programme.desc: This series travels around the world to meet the people who create the energies of tomorrow through unusual ideas. An extraordinary journey in 8 different countries to unearth imaginative solutions to the present energy and environmental issues.

programme.title: Super Octogenarians
programme.desc: Is 80 the new 50? Super Octogenarians track down some spunky seniors who are working way past their retirement age, and redefining the notion of active ageing. We travel across Asia to witness how these gutsy seniors are debunking the stock images we have of the old, and inspiring all with the tremendous energy they put into their extended professional lives.

programme.title: The Night Shift
programme.desc: A documentary program that discusses about people working at night day. What do they do, why they chose the job, as well how they deal with their lives whose cycle is reversed compared to people in general will be discussed in this program.

programme.title: Duo Backpackers
programme.desc: The journey of two travelers to magnificent hidden places across the islands of Indonesia.

programme.title: The Longest Day
programme.desc: Climate change is more than a set of abstract projections and statistics. It's the daily reality for millions of people across the world, living on the frontlines of the climate crisis. The Longest Day is a snapshot of the climate crisis in action - told through the voices of farmers, health workers, city residents and displaced families.

programme.title: Pridelands Safari
programme.desc: Join Brent Leo Smith and his amazing collegues for highlights from their exciting facinating adventures on the pridelands conservancy in the greater Kruger National Part, South Africa.

programme.title: Trail Town: Down Under
programme.desc: This family-friendly travel show is dedicated to cycling and the great outdoors, and to encouraging more families, couples and friends to explore the world on bicycle.Jump on for the ride of a lifetime as we explore the cycle trails, mountain bike parks, natural beauty and cuisine that Australia and New Zealand has to offer.

programme.title: Side Walk
programme.desc: This program discusses the traditional food with its history, by bringing chefs from some restaurants / hotels that create innovations from the cuisine. Guided by a host who has experience and interest in the field of culinary specialities, Side Walk is an alternative entertainment program in the form of information on regional cuisine that has never been timeless.

programme.title: Earth On Edge
programme.desc: Documentary series about the climate crisis. We travel to Iceland, Greenland, Denmark, Japan and California to explore the effects of a warming planet. While the situation is dire, there is hope. Brilliant minds are coming up with solutions that could show us a new way. As we stand on the edge, what is our next step?

programme.title: Tabula Rasa S3
programme.desc: A religious program that preached by Abu Marlo. He is a former magician that currently become an Indonesian motivator.

programme.title: Sea Morning Show (Live)
programme.desc: SEA Morning Show delivers up to-date news, live reports, talk shows and features about Indonesia and also Southeast Asia which airs daily 6 - 9 am.

programme.title: Satisfactory
programme.desc: Satisfactory means fulfilling expectations or needs; acceptable, though not outstanding or perfect. Is a cooking program that will present a healthy, special, and filling menu suitable for breaking the fast. Guided by an interactive and excellent host in preparing home-cooked meals, so that the audience can easily do it at home.

programme.title: Wellness Stories
programme.desc: Inspires people to relate to the emotion of the moment. Captures the wellness of life and the excitement of doing a healthy lifestyle. Spread spirit and happiness. Wellness is related to local wisdom too.

programme.title: Star Life
programme.desc: A high-energy infotainment program that seamlessly blends the latest from the global celebrity landscape with the hottest local Indonesian stars and social media influencers. The show's mission is to dissect and serve up all things trendy and zeitgeisty, ensuring a rollercoaster ride of entertainment and information.

programme.title: All About Women
programme.desc: This program is a kind of story rubric that is a friend to women, especially in Indonesia and Southeast Asia in general. The program will inspire women associated with their passion for hobbies, fashion, makeup, beauty and health, astrology, and events. There will still be a part of the local wisdom but adjusted to the coverage.

programme.title: Space Of Mine
programme.desc: Everyone dreams of having a dream home. A dream home doesn't have to be big and grand, but the most important thing is that it is comfortable and fits the owner's personality. This program will provide inspiration from people's stories about their unique homes.

programme.title: The Travel Note S5
programme.desc: The Travel Note is a light travel program that discusses about tourist attractions, which includes history, culture, variety culinary there and also the comfortable and affordable hotel. Presented by a young, attractive and dynamic host. The Travel Note also provides some tips and tricks to the audiences.

programme.title: The $100 Nomad
programme.desc: Got a weekend, an adventurous spirit and a hundred dollars? We fly Xenia, Fauzi and Zhin to 10 unexplored destinations with only $100 for food, activities and lodging. By chasing unreal landscapes and spending nights at unlikely abodes where no tourists go, the $100 nomads prove that budget stands in no way of a grand adventure.

programme.title: Factory Story
programme.desc: Food or goods that we encounter in everyday life without us realizing it go through a long process. Machines and hands that work hard behind the manufacture of a food, drink or goods are the main factors for the success of a product

programme.title: Beyond The Barn
programme.desc: Beyond The Barn wants the program to invite the audience to look beyond traditional livestock farming, by highlighting the business potential that can be generated. For example, cowhide produced from the farm can be used as raw material for leather shoes, showing how creativity can turn agricultural or livestock products into profitable businesses.

programme.title: Wild Cage
programme.desc: Indonesia's wildlife is incredibly diverse, with a variety of unique and spectacular wildlife living in Indonesia. Indonesia is home to many endemic species, and the existence of these endemic species is very important and part of our identity, as all creatures play an important role in maintaining the balance of Indonesia's wild ecosystems.

programme.title: Wild Things
programme.desc: Our landscape has changed dramatically over the last 50 years.Wild plants, bushes and trees have disappeared, and strange new plants have become familiar.With big, bold experiments and innovative approaches this series offers a colourful and engaging window onto our natural environment and reveals what the future may hold for biodiversity everywhere.

programme.title: Dingo Untamed
programme.desc: Dingo is an award winning Discovery Channel and YouTube Wildlife conservationist and adventurer whose various social media platform reach in excess of 200 million viewers every year. Through these videos, Dingo actively strives to create a lasting connection between people and animals in the hope that this connection can in turn help to save them.

programme.title: The Wild Bunch
programme.desc: Shot on location with stunning cinematography, The Wild Bunch offers an intimate insight into Africa's most threatened species. Travelling across South Africa, through wild bush, high grassland and arid mountaintops, each episode is freestanding; focusing on the challenges or conflicts of a particular animal.

programme.title: Fanatic
programme.desc: Great love and admiration for something can be an interesting story to talk about.

programme.title: Asian Art Stories
programme.desc: Asian Art Storiesprofiles 18 diverse Asian-origin artists across Fine Arts, Music, Dance, Theatre, Multimedia and Design. Weaving together personal stories and artistic practices through different perspectives, this series explores how life in Aotearoa New Zealand informs their work and sense of cultural identity.

programme.title: Indonesia Art Talk
programme.desc: A program that will show the artwork of every talented artist with all the achievements obtained. extraordinary work will amaze the audience.

programme.title: 3-Hour News Show (Live)
programme.desc: 3 Hour News Show is one of our flagship programs which airs daily 4 - 7 PM, this program have a CEO Talk segment where the guest star is the CEO of various reputable companies.

programme.title: Business Talk
programme.desc: Business Talk a talkshow program discussing about global stock markets.

programme.title: Sustainable Living
programme.desc: Providing inspiration that there is a different "Way of life". Some call it slow living, living off-grid. However, in this show, we describe it as self sustainable living. Providing inspiration to the audience that shows how lucky the Indonesian people are to live in a very generous land.

programme.desc: Maman Suherman or usually called "Kang Maman" wants to share stories with his inspirational friends that can motivate people to be successful.

programme.desc: Stories of young people who have pursued their dreams from an early age.

These long-time friends graduated vet school together 20 years ago. Mark is now a rural vet working with large animals and Stacey works in a busy animal hospital dealing with smaller patients.

programme.title: The Wild Bunch
programme.desc: Shot on location with stunning cinematography, The Wild Bunch offers an intimate insight into Africa's most threatened species. Travelling across South Africa, through wild bush, high grassland and arid mountaintops, each episode is freestanding; focusing on the challenges or conflicts of a particular animal.

programme.title: Sea Today Business (Live)
programme.desc: SEA Today Business delivers up to-date news and live reports about global stock markets.

programme.title: Exploring Nusantara With Kristian Hansen
programme.desc: Showcasing spectacular journey like you've never seen it before! Join with Kristian Hansen on non-stop journey one of Asia's most exotic and breath-taking nations Indonesia. Crossingmotorcycle journey from Sabang to Merauke to show you historic, cultural, people and insights alongside tantalising food and drinks, this show will inspire you and learn more about Indonesia.

programme.title: Tough Boats
programme.desc: A brand new series that explores some of the most fascinating and hard-core boat journeys on the planet. In this mini series we undertake epic journeys by boats in some of the toughest environments on earth. During our journeys we look at how the technology of boat travel has been adapted to survive, trade with and connect isolated communities.

programme.title: Travel Quest
programme.desc: Travel Quest is an eco travel adventure series showcasing some of the most exciting, exotic and often dangerous places in earth Host Bill Ball, a true " challenges himself in each episode as he attempts to check an adventure, thrill or rare animal off his personal bucket list Tracking jaguars, diving with sharks, climbing cliffs in Africa, photographing gorillas, bicycling across the Serengeti and finding cannibals on remote and forbidden islands are all part of his Travel Quest

programme.title: Epic Trails
programme.desc: Epic Trails is a visually stunning and inspiring television series that follows wilderness adventurer, Eric Hanson, on his journey to discover the world's most amazing trails Each 30 minute episode follows Eric on one of his world travels taking viewers on breathtaking adventures while sharing unique stories of the places and the people Eric encounters along the way

programme.title: Sustainable Living
programme.desc: Providing inspiration that there is a different "Way of life". Some call it slow living, living off-grid. However, in this show, we describe it as self sustainable living. Providing inspiration to the audience that shows how lucky the Indonesian people are to live in a very generous land.

programme.title: Living In Harmony
programme.desc: Living in Harmony is a program about comfortable living homes designed according to the character of the owner. We believe that every home is ideal for its owner, hence every home has a different feel.

programme.title: Green Living
programme.desc: Green Living is a program explores the life of gardening, both small and large scale. Gardening isa fun thing and can be a promising profession. Planters usually own large areas of land, and have patterns and ways to develop their natural products. They will then sell these natural products, in a simple way, which is beneficial for all people.

programme.title: 3-Hour News Show (Live)
programme.desc: 3 Hour News Show is one of our flagship programs which airs daily 4 - 7 PM, this program have a CEO Talk segment where the guest star is the CEO of various reputable companies.

programme.title: Hungry Hour
programme.desc: Street food is not just a matter of taste but also a story. Culinary recommendations that are delicious and suitable for anyone.

programme.title: Finding Dish
programme.desc: Program contains light information about the world of health and food combining

programme.title: Stories Of Taste
programme.desc: Stories of Taste will provide a new perspective about the taste of unique cuisines across the cities in Indonesia. Take an in-depth look at the struggles and history of the owners in building and creating great food or restaurants.

programme.title: The Meat And Greed
programme.desc: The food show that is a carnivore's delight, Meat & Greed is back for a sumptuous season 2! Join us on a savoury food crawl as we hunt down the best and tastiest meat dishes Singapore has to offer; sizzling charcoal barbecues, fork tender smoked beef briskets, succulent flamegrilled chicken, crispy whole roast pig, juicy handmade burgers, delectable steamed seafood and much more! In this flavourful protein-packed series, you know you will be getting the lion's share.

programme.title: Podsea
programme.desc: A podcast program where we talk to someone famous in the past. We do little throwbacks about a certain period of time, talk about music, movies, or trends that were happening in the past, to reminisce about some memorable old stories.

programme.title: The World Today
programme.desc: The core rolling news service of CGTN, with regular updates from Beijing, Washington, Nairobi and London, keep viewers up-to-date with all the worlds top stories as they happen. The World Today delivers breaking news, live events, in-depth reporting, expert analysis and sustained coverage.

programme.title: The Agenda
programme.desc: A weekly talk-show looking beyond the headlines and "accepted wisdom" to find the real story. Hosted by award-winning journalist and presenter Stephen Cole, the Agenda quite simply sets the agenda. You wont find the same-old talking heads recycling platitudes; instead thought-provoking guests to debate and explore key issues of todays world.

programme.desc: Africa Live is a news program that focuses on African issues and issues related to this diverse continent. CGTNs Nairobi-based broadcast center produces Africa Live. Local correspondents and local production teams provide authoritative and in-depth stories from across the region. Africa Live is an objective and comprehensive look at every facet of African life.

programme.title: Asia Today
programme.desc: Asia Today highlights the latest news and social developments across Asia. Correspondents in over a dozen countries report on the regions top stories as they happen. Analysts bring Asian perspective to topical and developing issues. Asia Today also emphasizes the diverse cultures and lifestyles of the worlds most populous continent.

programme.title: Dialogue
programme.desc: Dialogue is a prime time daily English talk show on CGTN. The 30-minute talk show covers a wide range of domestic and international topics, providing a balanced and critical perspective on current affairs and analysis within the framework of cross-cultural and multi-disciplinary comparisons. Inviting decision makers in government, business and academia onto the show, the host encourages guests to speak their minds frankly.

programme.title: The World Today
programme.desc: The core rolling news service of CGTN, with regular updates from Beijing, Washington, Nairobi and London, keep viewers up-to-date with all the worlds top stories as they happen. The World Today delivers breaking news, live events, in-depth reporting, expert analysis and sustained coverage.

programme.title: China 24
programme.desc: China 24 is a prime time news program featuring in-depth reports and analysis of the stories in the headlines in China. Produced by CGTNs studios in Beijing and Washington D.C., the show takes a compelling and comprehensive look at China. It explores the countrys business, politics, technology, culture, entertainment and more. China 24 tackles head-on the issues that matter most to the nation and its people, with topical reports highlighting challenges facing this fast-changing country.

programme.title: Global Business
programme.desc: The flagship business program of CGTNs English language service. The program offers in-depth analysis of the latest economic data, business trends and market moving policies, zooming in on how all this affects ordinary people. With separate editions out of Asia, Europe, Africa and the Americas, Global Business features analysts and news-makers supported through a global network of correspondents. Global Business shows you what's moving markets in both developed and emerging economies.

programme.title: The Point with Liu Xin
programme.desc: The Point with LIU Xin is a current affairs program on CGTN. The program comments on global news through LIU Xins very own unique perspective. With two decades of experience as a news anchor and overseas correspondent, LIU Xin has an engaging and personal style. The Point with LIU Xin connects world audience through social media, enhancing their participation as well as offering a comprehensive perspective on world events.

programme.title: The World Today
programme.desc: The core rolling news service of CGTN, with regular updates from Beijing, Washington, Nairobi and London, keep viewers up-to-date with all the worlds top stories as they happen. The World Today delivers breaking news, live events, in-depth reporting, expert analysis and sustained coverage.

programme.title: World Insight with Tian Wei
programme.desc: World Insight with Tian Wei is a long-running international platform for debate and intelligent discussion. It is the meeting point of both the highly influential and rising voices, facilitated by host, Tian Wei. Every Monday to Friday, it provides nutrition to form your own thoughts and ideas through live debate and interviews. Live debates linking movers and shakers take place in the signature segment "Global Debate".

programme.title: The World Today
programme.desc: The core rolling news service of CGTN, with regular updates from Beijing, Washington, Nairobi and London, keep viewers up-to-date with all the worlds top stories as they happen. The World Today delivers breaking news, live events, in-depth reporting, expert analysis and sustained coverage.

programme.title: The Vibe
programme.desc: The Vibe is a 30-minute TV show that runs daily on weekdays on CGTN. The content focuses on exciting new trends, fashion, and cultural topics across a range of disciplines both in China and abroad. The host presents various culture-related topics in a fun way while also doing some in-depth analysis to give viewers a fuller picture as to what is happening, and why it matters.

programme.title: Night Drama Serial "Me and Future Me !?" Eps. 21
programme.desc: Igarashi Raito (Tsuna Keito), a municipal worker for 10 years, has lived a stable life under constant pressure to avoid making mistakes in a society where a misstep could trigger a public backlash. One day, a man claiming to be Raito himself and saying he has come from the future, suddenly appears. The man predicts events in Raitos future one after anotherhis dreams, work, friendships, relationships, marriage, and family.

programme.title: Direct Talk
programme.desc: Ogata Yuko has developed a medical device that can measure fetal heartbeat and send the results to a doctor remotely. The goal is to make childbirth safer in places without specialized OB-GYN care.

programme.title: Learn Japanese From The News
programme.desc: A research team led by Japanese professor Takebe Takanori won an Ig Nobel Prize for discovering that pigs are capable of breathing through the anus. We learn expressions related to "iki" (breath).

programme.title: Easy Japanese

programme.desc: This episode introduces Japan's unique volunteer fire corps composed of local residents who often arrive at a disaster scene before professional firefighters. A Thai reporter visits Sano City.

programme.title: Sky is the Limit, The - EP 6
programme.desc: CHOW KWOK CHING (Lam Bowie) was a disorderly guy with no ambitions. Though he was in his thirties, he did not have a career and changed jobs constantly. Under his mothers pressure, CHING determined to join the police force. He did not do his work very well and finally was assigned to Sha Tau Kok where the border is. Meanwhile, CHING had misunderstanding with a mainland girl KAM LAN (Cheung Ho Yee, Maggie). He even perceived LAN as a bad woman and considered her as a sign of misfortune to him.

programme.title: When Easterly Showers Fall on the Sunny West - EP 29
programme.desc: Coming from a very humble background, POON MUK HING (Ma Tak Chung) nevertheless is content with his lot. He works for the POONs of Dongshan as driver. His true identity of the eldest son of the family comes to light when he saves POON CHEUK WAH (Wong Ho Yin), the young master, in an accident. CHONG FUNG YEE (Wang Ming Chun, Liza), the first daughter-in-law in the family, has to admit unwillingly the fact that when she married into the family she was already pregnant.

After regaining his consciousness, CHUNG-KEI finds himself trapped in the body of a millennial named BAO PAU (James Ng).

CHONG FUNG YEE (Wang Ming Chun, Liza), the first daughter-in-law in the family, has to admit unwillingly the fact that when she married into the family she was already pregnant.

programme.title: My Ages Apart - EP 7
programme.desc: Mentor and mentee, SUNG CHUNG-KEI (Bobby Au Yeung) and KWONG KONG-SANG (Moses Chan), are highly-regarded bankers. To move up the corporate ladder, KONG-SANG deliberately transfers CHUNG-KEI out, but the plane CHUNG-KEI takes crashes. After regaining his consciousness, CHUNG-KEI finds himself trapped in the body of a millennial named BAO PAU (James Ng).

programme.title: My Ages Apart - EP 8
programme.desc: Mentor and mentee, SUNG CHUNG-KEI (Bobby Au Yeung) and KWONG KONG-SANG (Moses Chan), are highly-regarded bankers. To move up the corporate ladder, KONG-SANG deliberately transfers CHUNG-KEI out, but the plane CHUNG-KEI takes crashes. programme.title: Vista of China (Sr.17) - EP 63
programme.desc: Through the program, explore the different development and new features of the Chinese nation from different perspectives, and understand Chinese culture in ancient and modern China and abroad.

programme.title: Sky is the Limit, The - EP 6
programme.desc: CHOW KWOK CHING (Lam Bowie) was a disorderly guy with no ambitions. Though he was in his thirties, he did not have a career and changed jobs constantly. Under his mothers pressure, CHING determined to join the police force. He did not do his work very well and finally was assigned to Sha Tau Kok where the border is. Meanwhile, CHING had misunderstanding with a mainland girl KAM LAN (Cheung Ho Yee, Maggie). He even perceived LAN as a bad woman and considered her as a sign of misfortune to him.

programme.title: When Easterly Showers Fall on the Sunny West - EP 29

programme.title: Life Made Simple - EP 1
programme.desc: TING SHEUNG WONG (KWOK CHUN ON) is a 30 years old man with the IQ of a seven years old boy. Ironically, he is surely happier than anyone else._x000D__x000D_ WONGs simple life ends when his best friend from childhood, WONG KEI FUNG CATHERINE (HSUAN JESSICA HESTER), goes to the U.S. to study. In order to realise FUNGs dream of studying abroad, WONG gives her all his savings. She works at the Chungs International Company Limited after her study.

programme.title: Life Made Simple - EP 2
programme.desc: TING SHEUNG WONG (KWOK CHUN ON) is a 30 years old man with the IQ of a seven years old boy.
